code: @Test public void testRootPath() throws Exception {     WebRequest req = new GetMethodWebRequest(CONTEXT_URL + "/services/").     ServletUnitClient client = newClient().     WebResponse response = client.getResponse(req).     assertEquals("The response message is wrong ", "Bye World", response.getText()). }
@Override public void configure() throws Exception {     from("servlet:/").setBody().constant("Bye World"). }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("servlet:/").setBody().constant("Bye World").         }     }. }
